reviewText: I think Mark Lowry is absolutely hysterical.  I love the way that he describes various life situations.  I love the way that he can make light of trials that he has been through by using comedy.  I love that he can still teach/preach through comedy.  I also love that he has a beautiful singing voice.  But, I don't necessarily want them blended together.  This DVD is really good but I just didn't feel as if there was enough comedy and too much singing.  I personally would have preferred if there was more comedy.  It's a good and funny DVD and I definitely enjoyed it.  If you are only a fan of Mark's singing or comedy, but not both, then I don't think you will enjoy this DVD as much (although you can fast forward through the parts you don't like).  However, if you like everything about him, then you will love this DVD.  I would definitely recommend it, especially for family viewing because it is good, clean and uplifting fun.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I really like Mark Lowry, but this dvd wasn't as Great as the other dvds like The Last Word, and On Broadway.  Check it out for yourself maybe you will see something I didn't.

reviewText: Mark and the people he has with him are great musicians who know how to share God's love in an enjoyable way.  Mark's message is inspiring and his presentation is extremely enjoyable.  Try it, you'll like it!
summary: Wonderful music and serious message with a great laugh.

reviewText: My first DVD and we love him!  Put his DVD on after a stressful day and you'll feel all the stress of the day leave as you laugh and sing along with Mark and his guests.  I highly recommend and plan on buying more of his DVDs!
summary: Mark Lowry is a unique and very funny man!

reviewText: I thought it was very good. Mark does a great job of keeping the show moving along and delivers a powerful message as well. Lordsong is not my favorite christian group but they did a credible job. The Issacs were great. I would recommend this DVD highly.

reviewText: Mark Lowry out did him self again, as usual.  he is funny and boy can he sing and entertain, wow
Title: N/A

reviewText: I absolutely love this DVD. Mark is so funny. What a talent! He can simply go from telling a hilariously funny story right into singing a song that will give me goosebumps and bring tears to my eyes. And if you think you have heard a good down to earth sermon, just wait until you hear the one Mark gives near the end of this DVD. It is so profound and so true and so simple that I want every member of my family to hear it and see it. Thank you Mark Lowry for your beautiful insight into the gospel message, both through your song and your sermon. Loved meeting your Mama in this one too.
Title: N/A

reviewText: All our family loves Mark, from our six-year-old to daddy.  Wholesome, Christian, family fun!
